pageContext.description: Fragment of broken bronze ring of which half of most is missing. Contains traces of wood.
pageContext.patina: Patchy green patina, most of the surface is the colour of pewter.
pageContext.associations: Part of a large hoard; see card for socketed chisel.
pageContext.publications: Arch. Journ. XXX, 279,Evans,Jessup, Arch. of Kent, 107,Journ. Anthrop. Inst. III, 230
pageContext.site: England,Kent,Saltwood,Hayne Wood, on line of railway cutting, 6 ft. below surface lying on stratum of sand, c. 25 yards NE by N of sumnmit of hill; found June 4, 1872.
pageContext.toSearch: Saltwood, Hythe, Hythe, Kent Ct21, UK
pageContext.remarks: ?Is this classification right? (No other hollow loop recorded).
